infos.value: Damn, just how many of them are there?
Just a little longer...
Again with that?
As you say. I'll trust you.
...My blade is needed here, I take it.
K-King Robb!
If His Majesty moves too much, the wound will—!
Lord Mont. I have received word from my soldiers.
They say we may just win this fight yet.
Do you mean to say that you believed them?
Of course... But what can we do to assist you?
We shall break through part of the castle gates and storm the interior.
That said, only one squadron will fully infiltrate the castle.
W-wait a moment. A squadron includes but twenty soldiers.
Do you truly believe those twenty alone will be enough to get back Lady Machérie?
How interesting. If I may, I would much like to join this squadron myself.
No, Your Majesty! You are in no condition to fight. Allow me to—!
No. You are to remain here. Someone must command «Solidus», after all.
B-but...
You have noticed as well, have you not? I am not long for this world.
King Robb! You can't—!
But if I could make use of what time I have left by guarding Machérie...
So you mean to sacrifice yourself!? I cannot allow it!
Machérie is only in such a predicament because of my foolishness.
No, Your Majesty, Sadali—
It is all the same.
King Robb...
Lord Mont...I must apologize. For Machérie's sake, please...
No need for apologies. That would have been my choice regardless. And...
Not only for Machérie. I do not wish for Sterne's sins to escalate any further.
Engelbert, cover me.
Did you not hear me?
Darling...
...As you will.
Please try...to return unharmed.
Shall we, Lord Mont?
Yes.
Lilyth...
I-I should—
I leave everyone in your hands.
...R-right. I won't let you down.
Stay safe, Lord Mont.
Breach the castle gates! All forces, attack!
